site.title: Sing for Hope
site.description: Sing for Hope harnesses the power of the arts to create a better world.

home.hero_title: Creating a better world through the arts.
home.hero_subtitle: Our creative programs bring hope, healing, and connection to millions of people worldwide.
home.programs_description: From public pianos to educational initiatives, our programs bring the healing power of the arts to every corner of society.
home.get_involved_description: Join our mission to bring art to communities everywhere. Whether through volunteering, partnerships, or donations, you can help us create positive change.
home.cta_title: Help Us Create a Better World Through Art
home.cta_description: Your support helps us bring transformative arts programming to communities, healthcare settings, schools, and beyond. Every donation makes a difference in someone's life through the power of creative expression.
home.cta_funds_direct: 100% of funds go directly to programs
home.newsletter_description: Get updates on our latest programs, events, and impact stories delivered to your inbox.
home.privacy_notice: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.

programs.pianos_description: Artist-designed pianos placed throughout communities, bringing music and joy to public spaces and healthcare settings.
programs.education_description: Music and arts education programs serving students from pre-K through high school with innovative curriculum and performances.
programs.health_description: Bringing healing arts programming to healthcare settings, supporting both patients and healthcare workers.
programs.diplomacy_description: Building bridges across cultures through collaborative artistic projects and international partnerships.
programs.workforce_description: Empowering individuals through arts-based career training and professional development opportunities.

footer.support_statement: Sing for Hope is supported, in part, by the New York State Council on the Arts with the support of the Office of the Governor and the New York State Legislature, by public funds from the New York City Department of Cultural Affairs in partnership with the City Council, the New York City Department of Education, and donors like you.
footer.legal_notice: Sing for Hope is a registered 501(c)(3) charitable organization (EIN 01-0856384). A copy of our most recently filed financial report is available from the Charities Registry on the New York State Attorney General's website (www.charitiesnys.com) or, upon request, by contacting the New York State Attorney General, Charities Bureau, 28 Liberty Street, New York, NY 10005, or Sing for Hope at 99 Wall Street #1812, New York, NY 10005.
